Body: Next on his checklist is wax to stick the feathers together and colors to paint them. He needs a total of 49 g of colors to paint them. If the feathers require 288 g of wax and right now he just needs 260 g
Question: How many grams of wax does he already have?

Question: How many more cups of flour than cups of sugar does she need to add now?

Question: How many apples does Jake have?
